00025 #include "OgrePlane.h"
00026 
00027 namespace Ogre {
00028     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00029     Plane::Plane ()
00030     {
00031         normal = Vector3::ZERO;
00032         d = 0.0;
00033     }
00034     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00035     Plane::Plane (const Plane& rhs)
00036     {
00037         normal = rhs.normal;
00038         d = rhs.d;
00039     }
00040     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00041     Plane::Plane (const Vector3& rkNormal, Real fConstant)
00042     {
00043         normal = rkNormal;
00044         d = -fConstant;
00045     }
00046     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047     Plane::Plane (const Vector3& rkNormal, const Vector3& rkPoint)
00048     {
00049         normal = rkNormal;
00050         d = -rkNormal.dotProduct(rkPoint);
00051     }
00052     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00053     Plane::Plane (const Vector3& rkPoint0, const Vector3& rkPoint1,
00054         const Vector3& rkPoint2)
00055     {
00056         Vector3 kEdge1 = rkPoint1 - rkPoint0;
00057         Vector3 kEdge2 = rkPoint2 - rkPoint0;
00058         normal = kEdge1.crossProduct(kEdge2);
00059         normal.normalise();
00060         d = -normal.dotProduct(rkPoint0);
00061     }
00062     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00063     Real Plane::getDistance (const Vector3& rkPoint) const
00064     {
00065         return normal.dotProduct(rkPoint) + d;
00066     }
00067     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068     Plane::Side Plane::getSide (const Vector3& rkPoint) const
00069     {
00070         Real fDistance = getDistance(rkPoint);
00071 
00072         if ( fDistance < 0.0 )
00073             return Plane::NEGATIVE_SIDE;
00074 
00075         if ( fDistance > 0.0 )
00076             return Plane::POSITIVE_SIDE;
00077 
00078         return Plane::NO_SIDE;
00079     }
00080     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00081     std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& o, Plane& p)
00082     {
00083         o << "Plane(normal=" << p.normal << ", d=" << p.d << ")";
00084         return o;
00085     }
00086 
00087 } // namespace Ogre
